translation.en: ♪ I get up in the evening ♪
[man] Classic, this.
♪ And I ain't got nothing to say ♪
-Shut up! -I know, it sounds great. It really hasn't dated at all.

translation.en: -Don't be late. -I won't.
Good luck with the selection.

translation.en: Don't let the fact that I've made A-team every year add to the pressure.

translation.en: You'll be fine.
-Dickhead. -Hey.
-Warning. -A-team dickhead.
translation.ja: 警告だぞ Ａチームのアホだ

translation.en: Can we please get this crap off?
-That's strike two. -[music stops]
That's not even swearing. Dad, "crap" is not swearing.

translation.en: -All right, mate. -Hey. You're not playing, Adam?
-Playing? -Yeah, Dads V Lads.
Dads V Lads?
Oh, shit... Uh, shoot. Um...
Sorry. It's Dads V Lads. I... forgot.

translation.en: Right. Right, it looks like we've found our goalie.
translation.ja: そうか キーパーは決まりだな

translation.en: Here's to total humiliation by kids.
Speak for yourself. I thought I had a good game.
[Adam] Oh, god. He's putting up a flip chart.
[man] Wait till he hands out the agenda. -Last year it was laminated. -[phone ringing]

translation.en: It's Corinne.
Tell her I've been on teacher trips. I know what goes on.
translation.ja: 教師の出張は経験済みだ

translation.en: Hey, babe. How's the conference?
[Corinne] Aw, it's tough, it's really tough.
I'm currently recuperating after a hot bath and two glasses of Rioja.

translation.en: Well, me and the boys are on a pub crawl.
translation.ja: 俺は― ライアンと はしご酒だ

translation.en: Ryan's getting the Sambucas in.

translation.en: -[chuckles] Where are you? Football? -Yeah.
Hey, listen, did you know it was dads and lads?
Yeah, I wrote it on the note.
-What note? -The one that's attached to the fridge.

translation.en: -What fridge? -Oh, ha ha.

translation.en: Listen, will you text me when you know which team he's on?
Oh, God, I hope it's the A.
Tom's really winding him up, and this Ryan swearing thing...

translation.en: I know. God, it's a nightmare.
Potty-mouthed little prick. Takes after his mother.

translation.en: Oh, God.
Bob's agenda. You're not gonna believe this.
Bob's agenda...
has got 26 items on it.

translation.en: Ah, yeah, well, I'm... I'm just gutted I can't be there.

translation.en: I'm sure you are.
I think you've done this on purpose.
I don't think there even is a conference. I'm gonna ask the other teachers.

translation.en: Actually, know what? I better get going. I have got dinner in half an hour.
translation.ja: 30分で食事だから もう行かないと

translation.en: All right, love. Well, you enjoy yourself.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, I will. I fully intend to.
Love you.
Yeah, love you. Bye.
Bye.
Wife left you to it, has she?
Ah, yeah, she's away. -Calls it work. -Hmm.

translation.en: So have you got a kid playing in the match or what?

translation.en: No.
You didn't have to stay with her, you know.
What?
Corinne. You didn't have to stay when she told you she was pregnant.

translation.en: I'm sorry. Do... do I know you?
Two years ago, she told you she was pregnant, right? That's why you stayed.

translation.en: She told you she was pregnant and then she lost the baby.
translation.ja: でも流産したと言われた

translation.en: -Who are you? -She lied, Adam.

translation.en: She made it up. She was never pregnant.

translation.en: Who are you? Why are you saying this?
Does that really matter?
Yeah, it does.
Okay. Think of me as a stranger. A stranger that knows.

translation.en: She had a bump.
It was fake.
Cast your mind back to that time. Did you ever see her naked? Fully naked?

translation.en: It wasn't real.
Excuses to avoid sex and sickness.
translation.ja: 不調を原因に セックスを拒まれ

translation.en: When the miscarriage came, you look back and realized the pregnancy had been difficult from the start.
translation.ja: 流産してもしかたないと 思ったんでしょ

translation.en: [inhales] It's gone.
How do you know my wife? Who the hell are you?
All right, folks, grab your beers. Let's get this show on the road.
translation.ja: じゃあ そろそろ始めよう

translation.en: [sighs] Think of me as a friend that just released you from prison.

translation.en: You're full of shit.
-You should be thanking me. -Yeah? Why is that?
Because now you know she's a liar.
translation.ja: 奥さんのウソに気付けた

translation.en: She faked the whole thing.
-[man] Adam? -Yeah.
If you need proof, look at your Visa card and check for a charge to Novelty Funsy.

translation.en: And one more thing.
If I were you... I'd run DNA checks on your two boys.

translation.en: Hey. Wait.
Stop! Who are you?!
Corinne.
It's gone.
I've lost it.
I'm sorry I wasn't here.
I love you so much.
Hi, this is Corinne. Leave a message.

translation.en: Hey, it's me.
Doesn't matter.
[man] Made the A-team. Good result.
[Adam] Absolutely.
Yeah, except Jimmy Hoch making the A's. What's that all about?

translation.en: -Yeah, well-- -What?
Ah, you know me, Adam. I'm not one for gossip. Bob lost his job.

translation.en: Since when?
Six weeks ago. But he doesn't want anyone knowing.
Anyway, he has this headhunter helping him find a job.

translation.en: This very successful headhunter. Stephen Hoch.
translation.ja: 実績のある スティーヴン･ホックだよ

translation.en: Jimmy's dad? You're kidding. That's outrageous.
Come on, you're a lawyer. This shit happens all the time.

translation.en: When it comes to looking after ourselves and our kids, then... [sucks teeth]

translation.en: ...we're all corrupt.
All right, see you tomorrow, mate.
Ryan.
[quietly] The fuck?
She made it up. She was never pregnant.
Now you know she's a liar.

translation.en: Query, payments, card transactions.

translation.en: I'm sorry. Could you repeat that?
Card transactions.
-I'm sorry. Could you repeat that? -Speak to a fucking human being!

Yeah, there's a... there's a charge on my account from a while back that I don't recognize. I think it might be a mistake.

translation.en: -What's the name of the company? -Novelty Funsy.
translation.ja: 社名は？ ノベルティ･ファンジー

translation.en: How are you spelling Funsy?

translation.en: Fun-sy. S-Y.
And the date of the transaction?
January...
fifteenth.
January 15th, 2017.
Ah, yeah. Some companies don't bill under their real name. It's for discretion.

translation.en: Discretion?
Yeah, like in hotels when adult movies appear as something else.
translation.ja: ホテルの成人映画などです

translation.en: -Uh, so what is it? -It's an online retailer,
translation.ja: それで？ ネット通販ですが―

translation.en: so I'll need to raise a specific inquiry

translation.en: if you're sure this is something that you didn't purchase.
translation.ja: 心当たりがなければ 確認します

translation.en: Yep, I'm sure.
I'll raise the inquiry. Can we get back to you on this number?
-Yep, thank you. -Have a good evening.

translation.en: [Tom] Dad?
-Is it okay if Daisy stays? -I'll sleep in the spare room.

translation.en: Did you ask your mum?
Yeah, she's cool with it.
Okay.
How did Ryan get on?
Yep, made the A.
Brother of their star player. It was inevitable.

translation.en: Dais.
-I just-- -I know.
We're gonna be going away...
Different unis. I just...
-I don't want it to be a big thing. -It won't.
translation.ja: あまり… ああ　約束するよ

translation.en: I promise.
Look, we're casual. No strings.

translation.en: This is a very casual kiss.
What?
Why didn't you just text?
[loud whisper] Prefer this. Old school.

translation.en: Two minutes.
Turn on your side.
Phillip.
[woman 1] So, uh...
guess what? I finally told him.
[woman 2] Oh, my God. How was it?
Surprisingly mature.
-Huh, really? -I know.
What did you say?
Sit.
Just the truth. You know, I said that--
Sit! Now come here. Now, sit!
No, no, no! Sit!
I said we've had 26 years.
Many of them happy, and that's not a failure, that's a success.

translation.en: -But, you know-- -[phone beeping]
Oh.
But, you know, now it's time for something else.

translation.en: I tried a new house analogy, but that all got a bit muddled.

translation.en: Was he upset?
Hard to tell with Phil. He slept in the spare room,
translation.ja: さあね　別室で寝てたわ

translation.en: but I think that was mostly symbolic.
-God. -[phone beeping]
Christ.
Sorry, the infant keeps calling me. I better find out what he wants.

translation.en: -Can I call you back? -Right.

translation.en: What is it?
I'll tell you what it is, some fucking weird shit.

translation.en: What are you doing on that thing?
"Investigating crime, really brutal. LOL."
Ooh, you're showing your age now, Jo.

translation.en: It's Johanna. How many times with that? And anyway, I thought you liked us oldies.

translation.en: He's not that old. He's not, like, your age.

translation.en: You said your new man was old enough to be your father.
Yes, technically, but you're actually old enough to be my mother. And even mathematically, my gran.

translation.en: Where's the body?
Don't you dare.
You've not seen the head?
No. No, it's just that, lying there like that.

translation.en: Oh, it's giving me the creeps. What is it? Some kind of sheep?

translation.en: -No, the neck's too long. -Giraffe?

translation.en: Joking.
I'm guessing, but llama. Alpaca. What do you think's going on there, on the leg?

translation.en: -Are they bite marks? -[bystander 2] I can't look anymore.
Bite marks.
And judging from the size and the shape of the indents... I'd say there's a reasonable chance that they're human.

translation.en: [woman] Hello.
-Ah, hello-- -Hi. We're from--
Hello, I'm... DS Johanna Griffin. This is DC Wesley Ross.

translation.en: There's no cause for concern.
We're just looking into an incident about a mile or so from here

translation.en: which involves an animal. Looks very much like a white alpaca.
translation.ja: 白いアルパカが 関わっているようです

Well, logic dictates. You know, they're not the most common--
[woman] We'll soon see.
Gary, Jason, Howard, Mark, Robbie.

translation.en: They're all there.
Liam, Niall... Harry, Zayn...

translation.en: Louis.
It's Louis. What's happened? Is he dead?

translation.en: Uh, I-- I'm afraid so. Yes, I'm... I'm sorry.

translation.en: And he's... he's been... decapitated.

translation.en: Decapitated?
Have you got any CCTV? You know, any... visual security?

translation.en: It's an alpaca farm, not Port Knox.

translation.en: [woman] Oh, shit.
It's "Fort" Knox. It's where the Americans keep their gold.

translation.en: I know.
Really?
No, I'm thinking of Alcatraz.

translation.en: [boy] Hey, Mr. Price.
Mike. When did you arrive?
Kind of earlier.
I didn't hear ya.
Right.
No.
Tom upstairs?
Shower.
-Hey. -You've got three.
-Give me the pancake. -[phone rings] I still want it.

translation.en: -Hello. -Gross.
[man] It's Martin. That Parth fella has just turned up.
translation.ja: マーティンだ　ヤツが来た

translation.en: Shit. Uh...
I'm on my way.
-Hey, bud. -Mike?
translation.ja: よう マイク 来い

translation.en: Now.
Hello?
[man 1] In here.
Where is he?
Oh, he's safe.
-Martin. -[man 2] Hello?
-[man 2] Is someone there? -[Martin] He's down there.
translation.ja: おい いるか？ 下だ

translation.en: -The cellar? -Yep.
[man 2] It's not fucking Silence of the Lambs.
Okay. Um...
Professionally speaking, I have to tell you that this is... -Don't listen to him! He's mental. -...kidnap.
translation.ja: 弁護士として言うと これは誘拐だ

translation.en: -[man 2] He's absolutely mental! -Bullshit.
Well, you are kind of holding him against his will.
I was a cop for 30 years, Adam. -I understand the definition of kidnap. -[distant banging]
translation.ja: 警官を30年やってりゃ 誘拐の定義は分かる

translation.en: -The door closed behind him. -[man 2] Let me out!
Okay.
-[man 2] I can't breathe! -Uh...
Do you mind if I...?
Be my guest.
But remember whose side you're on.
translation.ja: だが誰が味方か忘れるな

translation.en: All right! All right! All right!
Are you fucking kidding me? I've been down there nearly an hour.
Forty-three minutes.
You're crazy. He's crazy.
Okay, just calm down.
Calm down? I'm calling the police.
-Give me me phone. -I haven't got it.
-Give him his phone. -He's stolen me fuckin' phone!
-He's an old man. -Fuck off.
You are. He's an old man that doesn't want to move. Doesn't wanna sell. He's not interested in your redevelopment program.
translation.ja: 老人は引っ越さず 開発計画に興味もない

translation.en: And he really doesn't appreciate you showing up here unannounced,
translation.ja: 大金を持って 押しかけられるのを

translation.en: waving your big, fat, corporate checkbook around.
Now, we've lodged our objection, we've adhered to the deadline, and now due process needs to take place.
translation.ja: 異議を申し立てたから 次は法的な手続きだ

translation.en: And due process can be very, very slow.
translation.ja: えらく時間がかかるだろうな

translation.en: Cup of tea, anyone?
Okay, you're his lawyer. How much does he want?
translation.ja: 弁護士なら要求額を教えろよ

translation.en: A billion pounds.
I shouldn't tell you this, but I've been authorized to go as high as 400,000.
translation.ja: 言うべきじゃないが 限度は40万だ

translation.en: I shouldn't tell you this, but I've been authorized to say no to whatever you offer.
translation.ja: 言うべきじゃないが すべてお断りだ

translation.en: He can't win, the stupid, old fuck! And tricks like that...
translation.ja: 勝てないのに ふざけたマネを…

translation.en: Yeah... smile it up, asshole. You know and I know, everyone's got their price.
translation.ja: 笑ってりゃいいさ 誰だって金で動くんだ

translation.en: -Have they? -Yeah.
And in the end, trust me, the big guy always wins.
translation.ja: そう　いつだって最後には 企業が勝つ

translation.en: Lanky streak of piss.
[Adam] Behave.
-You think she sleeps with her alpacas? -[Johanna] Nope.

translation.en: Not sex, just cuddles. Maybe gets one in now and again on a cold winter's night.

What? What is it?
Back there, drive back.

Wes, where are we going?
Right.
There's more.
Jesus. Creepy.
There's a shoe.

Wes?
Yeah.
Footprints. Not shoes, feet.

Johanna!
Shit.

Shit.
DC Ross, assistance required, also an ambulance right now.

translation.en: He's alive!
Hello.
[man] Hi. Is that Mr. Price?
Speaking.
Hi. It's Hashim from Derwent Bank.

translation.en: Yeah, that's right.
Right. Well, I'm afraid we can't identify exactly what the payment relates to.

translation.en: It seems to be an umbrella title that covers several different websites.

translation.en: Uh, okay. No worries.
I've got a list of the ISP addresses, which I'm happy to send you,

translation.en: but obviously, I can't identify which of these, if any, is the source of the purchase.

translation.en: Um, yeah, sure, of course.
-I'll send it over now. -Please.

Sorry. Work call.
translation.ja: 悪い　仕事の電話だ

Yeah. The lunch thing got canceled. -Thank God. -[door opens]

Oh, come here. Let me hug you.
-Mum. -Oh, come on.

Uh, Serena was perfectly professional, right up until the point she dashed outside to vomit.

Oh, Corinne?

I haven't suddenly decided.

Thanks.

He didn't come home last night. His mother's beside herself.

Yeah. Bye.

translation.ja: それでここの商品を使って

translation.en: to pretend that I was going through the normal cycles.
translation.ja: 普通の妊娠に見せかけたの

translation.en: No one suspected a thing.
Sorry I couldn't be there.
You were when it counted.
[exhales] It's gone.
I've lost it.
[voice on phone] ...two, three, four...
I'm just showing him what teachers get up to outside of school.
translation.ja: 校外での先生たちの姿よ

translation.en: -Can I have a word. -What?
Garden.
Okay.
[Corinne] What's going on?
Did you fake your pregnancy?
-What the hell are you talking about? -Can we just skip this part?
translation.ja: 何の話よ そこは飛ばせ

translation.en: -What? -The part where you pretend not to know
translation.ja: え？ 何の話か 分からないフリはやめろ

translation.en: what I'm talking about. Let's just skip the denials, okay?
translation.ja: 何の話か 分からないフリはやめろ

translation.en: I know you faked your pregnancy.
Well, if you know, why are you asking?
What about the boys?
-The boys? -Are they mine?
Are you out of your mind?
You faked a pregnancy, Corinne. What else are you capable of?
translation.ja: どこまでウソか分からない

translation.en: Are they mine?
Yes! Christ, Adam.
Look at Tom's face, your eyes, your-- your-- your hair.
translation.ja: トーマスの顔や髪を見て

translation.en: How... How can you even ask me that?
translation.ja: そんな質問をするなんて

translation.en: So... talk to me.
translation.ja: じゃあ 説明しろよ

translation.en: What makes you think I faked a pregnancy?
translation.ja: なぜウソだと思ったの

translation.en: Credit card payment. Novelty Funsy. It's a cover name for a fake pregnancy website.
translation.ja: ノベルティ･ファンジー 偽の妊娠グッズ店の別名だ

translation.en: -Right. How do you know that was for me? -Was it?
translation.ja: なぜ私だと？ 君なのか

translation.en: What are you even doing looking through bank statements--?
Stalling.
Corinne...
you lied to me. You lied to the boys.
translation.ja: 俺や息子たちをだましたな

translation.en: Now, you better start talking right now.
translation.ja: 今すぐ事情を説明しろ

translation.en: Corinne.
Do you remember when I had two school periods off during lunch?
translation.ja: お昼に授業が ２つなかった時を？

translation.en: -What about it? -[sighs]
Well, I used to get out of school for a couple of hours. I'd go to that café in Portis Books.
translation.ja: よくポーティス･ブックスの カフェに行って

translation.en: I'd get a cup of tea, sit in the corner reading,
and after a while, Adam, you become a regular. The same people will be there like a community--
translation.ja: しばらくすると 常連と顔なじみになって…

translation.en: -And? -There was this woman.
translation.ja: それで？ スザンヌ･ホープは 初めての妊娠で８ヵ月だった

translation.en: Suzanne Hope. She was eight months pregnant. It was her first baby.
translation.ja: スザンヌ･ホープは 初めての妊娠で８ヵ月だった

translation.en: You know how young mothers-to-be are, all glowing
translation.ja: その時期の女性は 輝いてるでしょ

translation.en: and over the top like they're the first person to get pregnant--
translation.ja: その時期の女性は 輝いてるでしょ まるで…

translation.en: Great story. Can we get back to the fucking elephant sat here?
translation.ja: そりゃいいが本題に戻れ

translation.en: Can you just drop the sarcasm, Adam? I'm trying to tell you something.
translation.ja: 話してるんだから 皮肉はやめて

translation.en: -So tell me. -I liked her.
translation.ja: 続けて 私たちは友達になった

translation.en: We became friendly.
translation.ja: 私たちは友達になった

translation.en: And then one day she just stopped coming. Now, I... I just assumed she'd had the baby. She was way overdue.
translation.ja: ある時 来なくなったから 出産したと思ってたけど

translation.en: But she didn't reply to any of my messages.
Adam, please listen.
And she just killed all my calls--
-Is this going somewhere? -A few months later,
translation.ja: 結論は？ 数ヵ月後 カフェで見かけたら

translation.en: I saw her again in Starbucks near the library and she was pregnant.
translation.ja: 数ヵ月後 カフェで見かけたら おなかが大きかった

translation.en: Okay.
Heavily pregnant, Adam, like eight months.
So?
Well, it didn't make any sense. So I just-- I held back and I watched her.
translation.ja: おかしいと思って見てたの

translation.en: And she was with this group of other women in the corner holding court, talking to them about... about baby names.
translation.ja: 彼女は隅で女性たちと 赤ちゃんの名前の話をしてた

translation.en: And when she saw me she just looked terrified.
translation.ja: 私に気付いておびえてたわ

translation.en: Did you say something to her?
Yes, I did. She told me some story about having a stillborn. I don't know if it was true--
translation.ja: ええ 死産と言ってたけど 本当かは…

translation.en: Corinne, what are you talking about?
Please, Adam.
She loved being pregnant. It made her feel special.
translation.ja: 彼女は妊娠してるのが 好きだったの

translation.en: So she faked a pregnancy?
That's insane.
No, no, Corinne, that is not normal behavior.
translation.ja: 普通の行動じゃないぞ

translation.en: Yeah, well, she said her husband didn't care about her. She had no--
What does this got to do with us? You've got children, got me.
translation.ja: 君には俺も子供たちもいる

translation.en: What?
Crazy Suzanne and her shitty little life made you think, "I'll fake a baby."
translation.ja: スザンヌに触発でもされたか

translation.en: Why would you do that? Why would you fake a baby, Corinne?
translation.ja: なぜやった？ 妊娠のフリなんて

translation.en: For attention? Is this some kind of deranged midlife crisis?
translation.ja: 気を引くため？ 中年の危機？

translation.en: -Stop. -Okay, I'll stop. But you need to tell me everything from start to finish--
-No. -What?
I said no.
-You're not just gonna walk away. -What are you gonna do? Keep me captive?
translation.ja: 行かせないぞ どうする気

translation.en: You owe me an explanation.
I need some time.
Just tell me!
What are you gonna do, Adam? Beat it out of me?
translation.ja: 暴力でも振るうつもり？

translation.en: How did you find out?
A woman, a stranger. I've never seen her before.
-She came up to me and she-- -What woman?
translation.ja: 知らない女性が来て… 誰よ

translation.en: I've just told you, a stranger. How does she know any of this?
translation.ja: 知らない人だと言ったろ

translation.en: And you, what, you just believed her?
I just need you... to tell me the truth.
translation.ja: 君に真実を 話してほしいだけだ

translation.en: And I will. I will, I promise, but just...
translation.ja: 話すけど時間をちょうだい

translation.en: -Not like this. Not now. -Corinne?
This is insane. Corinne?
translation.ja: 異常だぞ　コリンヌ

translation.en: Adam...
this isn't what you think. There's more to this.
translation.ja: あなたが思うより 根が深いの

translation.en: So tell me.
Mum?
-Is everything all right? -Everything's fine.
What are they saying?
Still unresponsive.
Indications of moderate brain injury.
Could've hit a tree, could've been something else.
translation.ja: 木に当たったか別の何かか

translation.en: They're guessing he'd been there for hours.
Hours?
-What? -Do you think he jumped?
Why?
We pushed through those trees clothed. They're hard to get through.
translation.ja: あそこは木が茂ってた

translation.en: You aren't darting through at speed and falling down that drop, you're coming through slowly, thinking, "Whoa, big drop."
translation.ja: 走れるわけはないから 下り坂に気付いたはずだ

translation.en: -But if it was dark-- -If it was dark, you'd go even slower.
translation.ja: 暗い… 暗くて裸なら なおさら走れない

translation.en: Especially with your dick out.
translation.ja: 暗くて裸なら なおさら走れない

translation.en: Hey, trust me, this is my area of expertise.
translation.ja: 専門分野だから任せて

translation.en: So why was he naked?
He's run through the woods shedding his clothes.
translation.ja: 服を脱ぎながら進んだ

translation.en: Turned on by mutilating an alpaca.
translation.ja: アルパカを殺して欲情

translation.en: -If they're connected. -If.
-Let's not jump to conclusions. -No, no, sure.
translation.ja: 結論には早い ああ でも奇妙な事件が２つ 近所で起きた

translation.en: I mean, two really bizarre events happen within a mile of each other.
translation.ja: ああ でも奇妙な事件が２つ 近所で起きた

translation.en: Why would they be?
Let's find out who he is first. Check for misper calls.
translation.ja: まず誰か特定する この子を心配してる人が いるはずよ

translation.en: Someone must be worried this one didn't come home last night.
translation.ja: この子を心配してる人が いるはずよ

translation.en: I'll bring it over.
My dear.
Just what I need. Thank you.
-Here's to the new Johanna. -Cheers.
translation.ja: 新しいあなたに 乾杯

translation.en: Cheers.
No regrets?
-Not yet. -Hmm.
I'll tell you what, I won't miss the snoring. He's in the spare room and it's still, like, a thousand decibels.
translation.ja: 1000デシベルのイビキと 別れられるわ

translation.en: Listen to you.
What?
"Like, a thousand decibels." That infant's rubbing off on you.
translation.ja: デシベルだなんて 青二才の影響ね

translation.en: There's another good reason to retire.
Let's do the trip.
Come on. I mean, you're gonna be out of a job. You're out of your marriage. We always said we'd do it, Johanna.
translation.ja: 引退して離婚するんでしょ 前から言ってたじゃない

translation.en: You've got this place.
Yeah, which can be looked after.
And two dogs.
And a husband that can look after them.
Come on.
Me and you, Thelma and Louise across the states.
translation.ja: 「テルマ＆ルイーズ」 みたいにね

translation.en: All we've gotta do is book the flights and we're doing it.
translation.ja: 飛行機を予約しましょ

translation.en: [in Southern accent] "I'm in deep shit, Thelma. -Deep shit, Arkinsaw." -[chuckles]
translation.ja: “テルマ 失敗しちゃったよ”

translation.en: Listen. Um...
What you said yesterday, you were right. You deserve to know everything.
translation.ja: 昨日の話だけど 確かにきちんと説明すべきね

translation.en: And I want to explain, I do. But not like this, Adam. Not angry.
translation.ja: 私も話したいけど 怒ってない時にしたいの

translation.en: We have this school awards thing tonight. Why don't we just eat after at Juniper Yard?
translation.ja: 今日の授賞式が終わったら 食事に行きましょ

translation.en: We can eat and I'll talk, and then...
then we can see where we are.
You know the worst part about all of this?
I've stopped trusting you.
I know.
It hurts, doesn't it?
We all have our secrets, Adam.
translation.ja: 誰でも秘密を抱えてる

translation.en: Even you.
His name's Dante Gunnarsson. His parents reported him missing yesterday. He spends a lot of time out and about so they weren't immediately concerned.
translation.ja: 少年はダンテ･グンナルソン 両親は捜索願を昨日出してた

translation.en: -Are they with him? -At the hospital.
translation.ja: 今は？ 病院だ 今朝 脳波検査をした

translation.en: He's stable but unresponsive. They're doing an EEG this morning.
translation.ja: 病院だ 今朝 脳波検査をした

translation.en: In the meantime...
"The lacerations on the animal are from human teeth."
But...
"Human bite is usually an elliptical injury.
However, in this case, the pattern is interrupted by the absence of a left bicuspid."
translation.ja: “この件では 左の小臼歯が欠けている”

translation.en: I rang the hospital. Our boy has all his teeth.
translation.ja: 少年の歯は全部そろってた

translation.en: So, there's someone else.
There's someone else.
Vicky.
Bob, hello.
Have you seen Corinne?
Nowhere, no.
Oh, Vicky, can I have a word?
translation.ja: ヴィッキー 話があるの

translation.en: I just wanted to ask, and it's probably not a huge deal, but your Ella, she's stopped talking with Mia.
translation.ja: 心配ないとは思うけど エラがミアと口を利かないの

translation.en: And Mia said something's happened, but she won't say what it is.
translation.ja: 何かあったらしいけど 言わないのよ

translation.en: Do you have any idea what's going on?
No. No, none at all.
Well, there's something strange. I just thought you should know.
translation.ja: 変だから 言っておこうと思って

translation.en: She's been a bit down but...
I'm sure it's nothing serious.
-Hi. This is Corinne. Leave a message. -[beeps]
translation.ja: コリンヌよ　ご用件を

translation.en: Sadly, I must begin this evening of celebration with some difficult news.
translation.ja: 最初に 悲しいお知らせがあります

translation.en: One of our year 12 pupils, Dante Gunnarsson, has been involved in a serious accident.
translation.ja: ダンテ･グンナルソンが 重大事故に巻き込まれました

translation.en: And I'm afraid he's in a very worrying condition.
I'm sure you will all join me in wishing him and his family all the best for his swift recovery.
translation.ja: ダンテが早くよくなることを みんなで祈りましょう

translation.en: But we must carry on in difficult times,
translation.ja: でも前を向かなくては なりません

translation.en: and this evening is about celebrating
those students who have achieved or excelled... in this, their final year, of high school.
translation.ja: 最終学年の優秀な学生たちを 全員でたたえましょう

translation.en: And the award for art goes to Kiran Penvell.
translation.ja: 芸術賞はキラン･ペンヴェル

translation.en: Peter Harris.
Michelle Vosler.
And the one you've all been waiting for, the most visible underwear award...
translation.ja: お待ちかねの “下着が見えるで賞”

translation.en: No, seriously.
The award for best sporting achievement goes to Anthony Carter.
translation.ja: スポーツ賞は アンソニー･カーター

translation.en: Go on!
The final award this evening is our award, the students',
translation.ja: 最後の賞は 私たち学生が選んだ―

translation.en: and we were asked to vote for our teacher of the year.
And I've been asked to say that it has been a really close competition, as they're all so great.
translation.ja: “接戦だった”と言うよう 頼まれています

translation.en: Sadly, there can only be one winner.
And that person is...
Mrs. Price.
Hi. I'm not Mrs. Price, obviously.
translation.ja: どうも　本人ではありません

translation.en: Uh, Corinne can't be here tonight. She's, um... She's unwell.
translation.ja: コリンヌは体調がすぐれず 来ていません

translation.en: But I'd just like to say how much this'll mean to her.
She... loves this job, it's her life, and, uh...
translation.ja: 教職を生きがいとして 愛しているし

translation.en: she's always cherished the work that she does...
translation.ja: 大切にしているからです

translation.en: bringing literature to life and...
encouraging you lot to fall in love with... language, words.
translation.ja: 言葉を愛する大切さを 伝えています

translation.en: And as her husband, her passion and... belief in what she does
translation.ja: 妻が仕事に対して 燃やす情熱と固い信念には

translation.en: is something that I've... always deeply admired.
translation.ja: 夫としても感嘆しています

translation.en: But I will give this to her and she can come and tell you herself when she feels better.
translation.ja: 妻に渡すので 本人から話があるでしょう

translation.en: Cheers.
Think she'll be at home?
I don't know.
-How can you not know where she is? -Well, do you?
Sorry, mate. It's fine, okay?
translation.ja: 悪かった　心配するな

translation.en: Mum just didn't feel up to it tonight.
translation.ja: ママは気分が悪かったんだ

translation.en: Now you know she's a liar.
translation.ja: 奥さんのウソに気付けた

translation.en: There's more to this.
